body.class: home page-template page-template-template-home page-template-template-home-php page page-id-6 wp-custom-logo no-banner full-width elementor-default elementor-page elementor-page-6

div.p: Tuition-Free Public School | Pre-K through 8th grade.
Tuition-Free Public School | Pre-K through 8th grade.

section.class: elementor-element elementor-element-5e96b2c elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section

div.class: elementor-element elementor-element-9633113 elementor-drop-cap-yes elementor-drop-cap-view-default elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor

div.p: Following Governor Whitmer’s executive order on 2019-2020 school closure due to COVID 19, Multicultural Academy‘s school building facilities shall remain closed for the duration of the 2019-2020 school year.
For details, please click on the Principal’s formal notice on school building closure.

This is an emergency school closing due to the public health situation that is evolving and is changing rapidly. We will continue to communicate with parents, staff, and community once information is provided to Multicultural Academy Administration. Our number one goal is to make sure that students, families, and staff are safe and have resources to help them over the next few weeks. Please continue to follow the Washtenaw County Health Department prevention guidelines to ensure your family’s health is protected. For detailed information please visit https://www.washtenaw.org/1129/Health-Department

Students will be sent home with Learning Packets to be used during these two weeks. You will receive a phone call from your teacher up to twice a week to make sure your student is on track and be there if they have any questions.
Thank you for your patience, Multicultural Academy Administration

span.a: Multicultural Update on Breakfast and Lunch Program

section.class: elementor-element elementor-element-4bfd380 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section

div.p: Our diverse community celebrates students from around the world in a safe, welcoming environment with one-on-one and small group learning for students needing extra support.

section.class: elementor-element elementor-element-a10ccba elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section

div.p: Multicultural Academy is a tuition-free public school with curricula for Pre-K through 8th grade.
We offer an English language program for students who are new to the U.S. and the English language
We offer free transportation to students to and from school with pick-ups in the Dearborn area.

section.class: elementor-element elementor-element-61c16554 elementor-section-content-middle elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section

div.h5: Great Start Readiness Program at Multicultural Academy

div.p: Are you looking for free high quality preschool within Washtenaw County for a child who is 4 years old and wondering if you qualify? Please fill out our Preschool Interest Form by clicking on the image link above or call 1(800) 777 – 2861 to determine if your child is eligible to attend a FREE Great Start Readiness Program (GSRP). As you begin to you fill in your Preschool Interest Form, please remember to select Ann Arbor Public Schools from the School District drop down box and then select Program Preferences. There you will see Ann Arbor- Multicultural Academy from the drop down box.
To quality for Great Start Readiness Program at Multicultural Academy:

ul.li: Your 4 year old child/children must be born between 9/2/2015 and 9/1/2016
Your household income must be between 0-250% of the Federal Poverty Level
You must live within the Washtenaw Intermediate School District boundaries.

div.p: Click on the Image above to be taken to the Michigan Pre-school web site.

elementor-element elementor-element-dd913d9 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section

li.p: Our Great Start Readiness program is a free, high-quality preschool program for four-year-olds in Washtenaw County.
In our developmentally appropriate program, Kindergarten students learn fundamentals essential to reading and math.
We offer small classrooms where every student can receive the support he or she needs to succeed at each grade level.
As academics and social lives become more challenging, it's even more important that students feel comfortable.

div.span: © Copyright Multicultural Academy. All rights reserved.
